id.description: Uniquely identifies this porting phone number extension.

porting_phone_number_id.description: Identifies the porting phone number associated with this porting phone number extension.

extension_range.description: Specifies the extension range for this porting phone number extension.

start_at.description: Specifies the start of the extension range for this porting phone number extension.

end_at.description: Specifies the end of the extension range for this porting phone number extension.

activation_ranges.description: Specifies the activation ranges for this porting phone number extension. The activation range must be within the extension range and should not overlap with other activation ranges.

start_at.description: Specifies the start of the activation range. Must be greater or equal the start of the extension range.

end_at.description: Specifies the end of the activation range. It must be no more than the end of the extension range.

record_type.description: Identifies the type of the resource.

created_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was created.

updated_at.description: ISO 8601 formatted date indicating when the resource was last updated.
